resources.string: Laminaria is a genus of large brown seaweeds, commonly known as kelp, found in cool, nutrient-rich marine environments. Their complex thallus structure includes a holdfast, stipe, and blade. These seaweeds serves as vital compound of marine ecosystem, offering habitate and sustenance to various marine species.
